data.lyric:
[ti:It's Beginning to Look a Lot Like Christmas]
[ar:The Fontane Sisters]
[al:The Complete RCA Christmas Collection]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]It's Beginning to Look a Lot Like Christmas - Perry Como (佩里·科莫)/The Fontane Sisters/Mitchell Ayres & His Orchestra
[00:12.55]It's beginning to look a lot like christmas
[00:16.12]
[00:17.33]Everywhere you go
[00:20.49]
[00:21.07]Take a look in the five and ten glistening once again
[00:25.27]
[00:25.87]With candy canes and silver lanes aglow
[00:29.10]
[00:29.64]It's beginning to look a lot like christmas
[00:33.37]
[00:34.46]Toys in every store
[00:37.62]
[00:38.27]But the prettiest sight to see is the holly that will be
[00:42.60]On your own front door
[00:46.24]
[00:46.82]A pair of hopalong boots and a pistol that shoots
[00:49.20]Is the wish of barney and ben
[00:50.98]
[00:51.58]Dolls that will talk and will go for a walk
[00:53.51]Is the hope of janice and jen
[00:55.54]And mom and dad can hardly wait for school to start again
[00:59.48]
[01:03.94]It's beginning to look a lot like christmas
[01:07.55]
[01:08.73]Everywhere you go
[01:11.88]
[01:12.53]There's a tree in the grand hotel one in the park as well
[01:17.14]The sturdy kind that doesn't mind the snow
[01:20.61]
[01:21.16]It's beginning to look a lot like christmas
[01:24.75]
[01:25.91]Soon the bells will start
[01:29.16]
[01:29.68]And the thing that will make them ring is the carol that you sing
[01:34.02]Right within your heart
[01:37.78]
[01:55.07]A pair of hopalong boots and a pistol that shoots
[01:57.28]Is the wish of barney and ben
[01:59.08]
[01:59.75]Dolls that will talk and will go for a walk
[02:01.84]Is the hope of janice and jen
[02:03.51]And mom and dad can hardly wait for school to start again
[02:07.53]
[02:11.88]It's beginning to look a lot like christmas
[02:15.47]
[02:16.64]Soon the bells will start
[02:19.74]
[02:20.32]And the thing that will make them ring is the carol that you sing
[02:24.58]Right within your heart
data.trans:
[ti:It's Beginning to Look a Lot Like Christmas]
[ar:The Fontane Sisters]
[al:The Complete RCA Christmas Collection]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:12.55]圣诞气氛开始浓厚
[00:16.12]
[00:17.33]不论你走到哪儿
[00:20.49]
[00:21.07]瞧一眼小卖部又开始闪耀夺目
[00:25.27]
[00:25.87]糖果手杖，银色小巷
[00:29.10]
[00:29.64]圣诞气氛开始浓厚
[00:33.37]
[00:34.46]每个商店的玩具
[00:37.62]
[00:38.27]但那最美的风景仍是
[00:42.60]自家门前的那颗冬青树
[00:46.24]
[00:46.82]一双期望已久的靴子和一把射机枪
[00:49.20]这是Barney 和Ben的愿望
[00:50.98]
[00:51.58]会说话和走路的布娃娃
[00:53.51]是Janice和Jen的希望
[00:55.54]爸爸妈妈不再等待再次开学
[00:59.48]
[01:03.94]圣诞气氛开始浓厚
[01:07.55]
[01:08.73]不论你走到哪儿
[01:11.88]
[01:12.52]都会有一棵树在饭店里像在公园里的一样
[01:17.13]强健不畏风雪
[01:20.61]
[01:21.16]圣诞气氛开始浓厚
[01:24.75]
[01:25.91]马上钟声就要敲响
[01:29.16]
[01:29.68]使它响起的正是那歌谣在你心中所唱
[01:34.02]在你心中所唱
